title: You wrecked league.
body:
No blue essence reward per game, only per level. I bought a boost that was xp+ip and now I'm level 25 and I don't get shit.

Honestly, I've played about 5 games since you wrecked this game. Idiots.

Uninstalled. Shit game. Shit community. Shit developers. Good riddens.

replies.body: nah. It's a shit game and im pretty sure im just one of many who quit after the shit change they made. You do you though.

I think the overall gain is marginally higher from the capsules (just less of a drip feed than it was in the old per-game system). They also made it super obvious that they were removing IP boosts because XP is the only way to gain blue essence, through levelling up.

Honestly every issue you have that you listed in your post is entirely borne of your own misunderstandings. Also small wonder you have no Blue Essence income if you aren't really playing. That, and the fact that you would barely be earning IP under the old system anyway through lack of participation.
No. I'm level 50 right now and I've only got 6000 blue essence all up from playing 100+ games. So no, overall gain is not higher since RNG exists.
It doesn't sound like you're letting go of stuff from capsules you don't really need...
You mean the 90 BE shards I'm getting?
That's fair. I suppose I was lucky in my intake, then. 6k seems low for 50 though. I've at least that, if not more from only 30-42? Reasonably sure there's still an absolute minimum.

Essembie, I'll think you'll find indy companies like GGG (PoE) are still pretty legit in the ftp market.

All the blizzard shit (f2p like Hearthstone, is down the toilet).

Like it says.. You don't get any blue essence upon completion of a game. All you get is xp.

U get BE for first win of the day... do ur research before u start complaining. But I do agree that they should up the amount of BE in total. But a bad ig currency system doesnt affect gameplay at all... sounds like a bad player finding an excuse to quit.

I just went and checked my match history and, my mistake i had no idea they removed us being able to get blue ess per match after first win. i just returned to league a few days ago. yes it's true we get some for first win of the day, though idk why they'd do that.

Its all about the $$$.

Riot have gone from a pioneer of ftp done well to a dog ugly clone of EA the most hated game company in the world.

Well played.

Bro, you think 50 be for first win of the day is fucking good? I used to atleast get that amount just for losing with the IP system. 
Now I have to actually win and ontop of that my next reward isn't until I play about 20 games to level or wait til the next day to get another 50 be! 

lol yeah them 90 be shards are fucking shit dude. I'm level 40 now still with only 6 champs because in total I've only had about 16 champ capsules from levelling. I started in this season at level 25ish. that's including the 2 glorious champ capsules. About 3/4 of them didn't have any shards just some BE. That's how the new system has fucked me well.

Right now you get Blue Essence not only from capsules, but also from missions like First Win of the Day, and some other missions.
I agree that getting Blue Essence right now is not as easy as it was to get Influence Points in the old system even with missions, but it is not always that difficult to get Blue Essence, I am sure that some time in the future Riot will push out more missions that give you Blue Essence if you complete them.
I just tried Dota 2 and fucking hated it. Will probably try to adapt to the new league LOL but Seriously, it was better before the change. IT's dumb what they did.
Yep, it's pretty fucking dumb. For real.
